content: this little guy is only 3 tall and 1 5 wide my goal with this pattern was to make a small gnome with no sewing required enjoy your new small no sew gnome connect with me here 1 i do not charge for my patterns but if you would like to support my work you can tip me on venmo @thoseyellowthings 1 https //www flowcode com/page/thoseyellowthings
